title: Blood Mate
description: They call me the Blade Runner, saying that I'm deadly fast. Don't blink if you want to stay alive!So yeah, I'm a deadly demon hunter and assassin who gets the job done. For a price.Billionaire Devon Fox believes he has a demon targeting him, so he hires me for a quick escort. He's dreamy, arrogant and knows way too much about me. Still, when someone offers an irresistible price on his head, I need to put my feelings and crazy attraction aside to get the job done. The more I spend time with my target, the harder it is to resist him.My problem gets more complicated as I’m a hybrid; part wolf shifter and part blood bender, and now my Wolf Shifter part has decided to connect to Devon’s best friend through a fated mate bond. You think that’s where my problems end? No! To rebel, my Blood Bender half has claimed Devon as her blood mate! It feels like I have two souls and two mates but only one body!Find out who Nina will kill next by reading BLOOD MATE, an Urban Fantasy that will transport you to another world where Shadow Crawlers must be killed, and love always gets in the way!* Contains violence and foul language
author: T.M. Caruana
